text: Lowell Newton Galloway (July 7, 1921 – February 11, 1979) was an American professional basketball player. He played for the Indianapolis Kautskys in the National Basketball League and averaged 1.7 points per game during 1946–47. He played college basketball at the University of Evansville. After his professional career ended, Galloway went into coaching and teaching. He died from a stroke in 1979. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:1979 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Indiana Category:Basketball players from Kentucky Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Evansville Purple Aces men's basketball players Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:High school basketball coaches in Indiana Category:High school football coaches in Indiana Category:Indianapolis Kautskys players Category:Sportspeople from Evansville, Indiana
title: Lowell Galloway
